commands.C1: Increments the first numeric attribute value on each selected block by 1.
commands.D1: Decrements the first numeric attribute value on each selected block by 1.
commands.C2: Prompts for a custom increment value and applies it to the first numeric attribute on selected blocks.
commands.D2: Prompts for a custom decrement value and applies it to the first numeric attribute on selected blocks.
commands.F1: Sets the first attribute on each selected block to a user-entered string value.
commands.CHLAY: Finds the closest matching layer name from a search string, then moves the previous selection or current layer to that match.
commands.CLEANUP: Runs SETBYLAYER on all objects, PURGE ALL, and AUDIT with fixes to clean the current drawing.
commands.ETOG: Freezes or thaws layers matching WL/WL-STAMP style names, following the state of the first match.
commands.LTOG: Toggles freeze/thaw for XREF layers containing a user-specified text fragment.
commands.MTOG: Toggles freeze/thaw for layers containing "christian" or "CD stamp".
commands.REV1: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 1 with a live preview.
commands.REV2: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 2 with a live preview.
commands.REV3: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 3 with a live preview.
commands.REV4: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 4 with a live preview.
commands.REV5: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 5 with a live preview.
commands.REV6: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 6 with a live preview.
commands.REV7: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 7 with a live preview.
commands.REV8: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 8 with a live preview.
commands.REV9: Creates a revision cloud and delta tag labeled 9 with a live preview.
commands.SUMLENGTHS: Sums the lengths of selected lines, arcs, polylines, and reports the total.
commands.TEXTCOUNT: Counts how many times each text/MTEXT value appears and reports totals.
commands.TSELECT: Keeps only TEXT and MTEXT from a selection set.
